title: Compiling error of gloo when installing pytorch from source
body_html:
Hi,

I am trying to install pytorch from source and faced a compiling problem of gloo. I followed the instruction in the README. Below is the error log.

/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc: In function 'int gloo::getInterfaceSpeedGLinkSettings(int, ifreq*)':
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:209:10: error: 'SPEED_UNKNOWN' was not declared in this scope
   return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:209:10: note: suggested alternative: 'DT_UNKNOWN'
   return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
          DT_UNKNOWN
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc: In function 'int gloo::getInterfaceSpeedGSet(int, ifreq*)':
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:223:12: error: 'SPEED_UNKNOWN' was not declared in this scope
     return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:223:12: note: suggested alternative: 'DT_UNKNOWN'
     return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
            DT_UNKNOWN
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc: In function 'int gloo::getInterfaceSpeedByName(const string&)':
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:237:12: error: 'SPEED_UNKNOWN' was not declared in this scope
     return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:237:12: note: suggested alternative: 'DT_UNKNOWN'
     return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
            DT_UNKNOWN
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:247:13: error: 'SPEED_UNKNOWN' was not declared in this scope
   if (rv != SPEED_UNKNOWN) {
             ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:247:13: note: suggested alternative: 'DT_UNKNOWN'
   if (rv != SPEED_UNKNOWN) {
             ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
             DT_UNKNOWN
make[2]: *** [gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo.dir/common/linux.cc.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
make[1]: *** [gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

Any help would be appreciated.

Hi,
I am trying to install pytorch from source and faced a compiling problem of gloo. I followed the instruction in the README. Below is the error log.
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc: In function 'int gloo::getInterfaceSpeedGLinkSettings(int, ifreq*)':

   return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~

/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:223:12: note: suggested alternative: 'DT_UNKNOWN'
     return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
            DT_UNKNOWN
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc: In function 'int gloo::getInterfaceSpeedByName(const string&)':
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:237:12: error: 'SPEED_UNKNOWN' was not declared in this scope

            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:237:12: note: suggested alternative: 'DT_UNKNOWN'
     return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~

make: *** [all] Error 2

Any help would be appreciated.
body:
Hi,

I am trying to install pytorch from source and faced a compiling problem of gloo. I followed the instruction in the README. Below is the error log.

```
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc: In function 'int gloo::getInterfaceSpeedGLinkSettings(int, ifreq*)':
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:209:10: error: 'SPEED_UNKNOWN' was not declared in this scope
   return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:209:10: note: suggested alternative: 'DT_UNKNOWN'
   return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
          DT_UNKNOWN
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc: In function 'int gloo::getInterfaceSpeedGSet(int, ifreq*)':
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:223:12: error: 'SPEED_UNKNOWN' was not declared in this scope
     return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:223:12: note: suggested alternative: 'DT_UNKNOWN'
     return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
            DT_UNKNOWN
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc: In function 'int gloo::getInterfaceSpeedByName(const string&)':
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:237:12: error: 'SPEED_UNKNOWN' was not declared in this scope
     return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:237:12: note: suggested alternative: 'DT_UNKNOWN'
     return SPEED_UNKNOWN;
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
            DT_UNKNOWN
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:247:13: error: 'SPEED_UNKNOWN' was not declared in this scope
   if (rv != SPEED_UNKNOWN) {
             ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
/infolab/node4/lukuang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc:247:13: note: suggested alternative: 'DT_UNKNOWN'
   if (rv != SPEED_UNKNOWN) {
             ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
             DT_UNKNOWN
make[2]: *** [gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo.dir/common/linux.cc.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
make[1]: *** [gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
```

Any help would be appreciated.
